title: 服务器没有安装插件但有两个区块只有op才能破坏
author: cswwpc10
txt_content:
>version
[18:45:53 INFO]: This server is running Cauldron-MCPC-Plus version git-Cauldron-Reloaded-1.7.10-1.1388.1.0 (MC: 1.7.10) (Implementing API version 1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT)

replies.author: 水煮清娃
replies.txt_content: 那是spawn出生点保护吧 在配置文件里可以关闭出生点保护

replies.author: xiangnian
replies.txt_content:
打开服务端根目录下的server.properties文件
将spawn-protection=16设置为spawn-protection=0试试
spawn-protection=16  #出生点保护范围
